paragraphs.text:
%md
## Graph Pattern Matching
Please visit [the relevant section in pgql-lang.org](https://pgql-lang.org/spec/1.3/#writing-simple-queries) for more details.

![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4862919/88668298-665f4d80-d11d-11ea-9680-0e89f15c1e98.jpg)

msg.data:
Graph Pattern Matching

Please visit the relevant section in pgql-lang.org for more details.

paragraphs.text:
%pgx
import oracle.pgx.api.*
import groovy.json.*

baseUrl = 'http://graph-server:7007'
username = 'graph_dev'
password = 'Welcome1'

conn = new URL("$baseUrl/auth/token").openConnection()
conn.setRequestProperty('Content-Type', 'application/json')
token = conn.with {
  doOutput = true
  requestMethod = 'POST'
  outputStream.withWriter { writer ->
    writer << JsonOutput.toJson([username: username, password: password])
  }
  return new JsonSlurper().parseText(content.text).access_token
}

instance = Pgx.getInstance(baseUrl, token)
session = instance.createSession("my-session")
paragraphs.title: Connect to Graph Server

paragraphs.title: Filter predicates (1)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
// Find all persons that have a date of birth (dob) greater than 1995-01-01
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT n.name, n.dob
  FROM MATCH (n)
 WHERE n.dob > DATE '1995-01-01'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Filter predicates (2)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
// Find people that Kathrine knows and that are old than her
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT m.name AS name, m.dob AS dob
  FROM MATCH (n) -[e]-> (m)
 WHERE n.name = 'Kathrine' AND n.dob <= m.dob
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: More complex patterns (1)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
// Find people that Lee knows and that are a student at the same university as Lee
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT p2.name AS friend, u.name AS university
  FROM MATCH (u:University) <-[:studentOf]- (p1:Person) -[:knows]-> (p2:Person) -[:studentOf]-> (u)
 WHERE p1.name = 'Lee'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: More complex patterns (2)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
// The same as above
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT p2.name AS friend, u.name AS university
  FROM MATCH (p1:Person) -[:knows]-> (p2:Person)
     , MATCH (p1) -[:studentOf]-> (u:University)
     , MATCH (p2) -[:studentOf]-> (u)
 WHERE p1.name = 'Lee'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Binding an element multiple times (1)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
// Find friends of friends of Lee
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT p1.name AS p1, p2.name AS p2, p3.name AS p3
  FROM MATCH (p1:Person) -[:knows]-> (p2:Person) -[:knows]-> (p3:Person)
 WHERE p1.name = 'Lee'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
p1	p2	p3
Lee	Kathrine	Riya
Lee	Kathrine	Lee

paragraphs.title: Binding an element multiple times (2)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
// The same as above (but exclude the hopping back)
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT p1.name AS p1, p2.name AS p2, p3.name AS p3
  FROM MATCH (p1:Person) -[:knows]-> (p2:Person) -[:knows]-> (p3:Person)
 WHERE p1.name = 'Lee' AND p1 <> p3
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

Lee	Kathrine	Riya

paragraphs.title: Binding an element multiple times (3)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
// The same as above
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT p1.name AS p1, p2.name AS p2, p3.name AS p3
  FROM MATCH (p1:Person) -[:knows]-> (p2:Person) -[:knows]-> (p3:Person)
 WHERE p1.name = 'Lee' AND ALL_DIFFERENT(p1, p3)
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
p1	p2	p3
Lee	Kathrine	Riya

paragraphs.title: Binding an element multiple times (4)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
// Find two people that both know Riya
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT p1.name AS p1, p2.name AS p2, e1 = e2
  FROM MATCH (p1:Person) -[e1:knows]-> (riya:Person)
     , MATCH (p2:Person) -[e2:knows]-> (riya)
 WHERE riya.name = 'Riya'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
p1	p2	e1 = e2
Kathrine	Kathrine	true

paragraphs.text:
%pgx
graph.explainPgql("""
SELECT p1.name AS p1, p2.name AS p2, p3.name AS p3
  FROM MATCH (p1:Person) -[:knows]-> (p2:Person) -[:knows]-> (p3:Person)
 WHERE p1.name = 'Lee' AND p1 <> p3
""");
